ServerPackage

Class Registration

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerPackage.Registration

  • public class Registration
extends java.lang.Object
    The registration class of the server that adds and completes the registration of a course to a student
    Since:
    April 20, 2020
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Steven Ha, Baylee Cheung, Andy Eom

      A constructor for the registration class that initializes the database

      • completeRegistration

        public java.lang.String completeRegistration(Student st,
                                             CourseOffering of)
        A function that completes the registration of a student
        Parameters:
        st - - The student to add the registration to
        of - - The course offering to be added to the students list of registrations
        Returns:
        - A message that tells the client if the registration was successful or not

      • deleteRegistration

        public java.lang.String deleteRegistration(Student st,
                                           CourseOffering of)
        A function that removes a registration from the student that is logged into the server
        Parameters:
        st - - The student with a registration to be removed
        of - - The course offering to be removed from the students registration list
        Returns:
        - A message that tells the client if a registration has been successfully removed or not
